snippet.title: THE LIBERALS' PLAN B IS AN F
snippet.content: The Liberals held an emergency meeting of federal MPs and came up with a plan B to stop the party splitting over gay marriage. It is for a voluntary postal vote - which activists can easily rig. What could go wrong? Missing is not just the Prime Minister but any passion for arguing that giving the public a proper vote is a moral issue.

sindex.name: LIBERALS' PLAN B IS AN F
